explains: v. 切除；删除；收税，征税
wordGroup: excise tax 消费税；特许权税

sentences.en: There has been a sharp increase in vehicle excise.
The results are affected by pre-stocking at the end of last year in reaction to the excise duty hike.
sentences.cn: 由于消费税提高，去年年底的预库存影响了结果。

sentences.en: After the furore which greeted our first report I felt pusillanimously that we should excise this explanatory passage.
sentences.cn: 在我们的第一份报告引起骚动之后，我有些胆怯地觉得我们应该删去这段解释性的文字。
